Description: Zendesk makes it easy to support customers when they need your help.
Name: Zendesk

Methods.Name: Update Group
Methods.Description: Update an existing group.

Methods.Name: Get Groups Count
Methods.Description: Get the number of groups.

Methods.Name: Create Group
Methods.Description: Create a new group.

Methods.Name: Get Group
Methods.Description: Get a group by its group ID.

Methods.Name: List Groups
Methods.Description: Get a list of all groups.

Methods.Name: Delete Group
Methods.Description: Delete a group.

Methods.Name: List Assignable Groups
Methods.Description: Get a list of all groups that can have members assigned.

Methods.Name: Get Job Status
Methods.Description: Get Job.

Methods.Name: Search Organizations
Methods.Description: Search for an organization.

Methods.Name: Upsert Organization
Methods.Description: Create or Update an Organization.

Methods.Name: List Organizations
Methods.Description: Get a List of All Organizations.

Methods.Name: Get Organization
Methods.Description: Get an Organization by ID.

Methods.Name: List Satisfaction Ratings
Methods.Description: Get all received satisfaction ratings for an account.

Methods.Name: Get Ticket Rating
Methods.Description: Gets the satisfaction rating for a specific ticket.

Methods.Name: Create Satisfaction Rating
Methods.Description: Create the satisfaction rating for a solved ticket, or one that was solved and then re-opened.

Methods.Name: Update Ticket
Methods.Description: Updates a Zendesk ticket. Any new custom fields options will be added to Zendesk.

Methods.Name: Delete Ticket
Methods.Description: Deletes a Zendesk ticket.

Methods.Name: List New Tickets
Methods.Description: Search for tickets that are new.

Methods.Name: List Open Tickets
Methods.Description: Search for tickets that are open.

Methods.Name: List Pending Tickets
Methods.Description: Search for tickets that are pending.

Methods.Name: List On Hold Tickets
Methods.Description: Search for tickets that are on hold.

Methods.Name: List Solved Tickets
Methods.Description: Search for tickets that have been solved.

Methods.Name: List Closed Tickets
Methods.Description: Search for tickets that are closed.

Methods.Name: Search Tickets by Email
Methods.Description: Search for tickets submitted by a specified email address.

Methods.Name: Import Ticket
Methods.Description: Import a ticket into Zendesk.

Methods.Name: Create Multiple Tickets
Methods.Description: Bulk import tickets into Zendesk.

Methods.Name: Get Ticket
Methods.Description: Get a ticket.

Methods.Name: Bulk Updates Tickets
Methods.Description: To make the same change to multiple tickets.

Methods.Name: Batch Updates Tickets
Methods.Description: To make different changes to multiple tickets.

Methods.Name: Show Ticket
Methods.Description: Returns a number of ticket properties though not the ticket comments.

Methods.Name: List Tickets
Methods.Description: Get a List of All Tickets.

Methods.Name: Search Ticket By ID
Methods.Description: Search for tickets by ticket ID.

Methods.Name: Create Ticket
Methods.Description: Creates a Zendesk ticket. Any new custom fields options will be added to Zendesk.

Methods.Name: Search Tickets
Methods.Description: Search for tickets using your own criteria. Returns a maximum of 1,000 matching tickets.

Methods.Name: Export Audit Logs
Methods.Description: Export the audit logs.

Methods.Name: Get Audit Log
Methods.Description: Get a single audit log by it's ID.

Methods.Name: List Audit Logs
Methods.Description: Get a list of all audit logs.

Methods.Name: Get App Information
Methods.Description: Retrieves information about the specified app accessible to the current user and account.

Methods.Name: Update App Installation
Methods.Description: Updates the specified installation.

Methods.Name: List Owned Apps
Methods.Description: List all apps owned by the current account.

Methods.Name: Send Notification to App
Methods.Description: Sends messages to currently open instances of a Zendesk Apps framework (ZAF) app. The messages cause an event to fire in the app.

Methods.Name: Get Requirements Install Status
Methods.Description: Returns the status of the requirements installation.

Methods.Name: Upload App Package
Methods.Description: Uploads a new app package to Zendesk Support.

Methods.Name: Get App Installation
Methods.Description: Retrieves information about the specified app installation.

Methods.Name: Delete App Installation
Methods.Description: Removes an installed app.

Methods.Name: List Requirements
Methods.Description: Lists all app requirements for an installation.

Methods.Name: Delete App
Methods.Description: Delete the specified app and remove it from the My Apps page in Zendesk Support.

Methods.Name: List App Installations
Methods.Description: List all apps installed in the account.

Methods.Name: Install App
Methods.Description: Install an app in the account.

Methods.Name: Create App
Methods.Description: Adds a build of a new app to the job queue.

Methods.Name: Update App
Methods.Description: Adds a build of an existing app to the job queue.

Methods.Name: Get Current Session
Methods.Description: Show the currently authenticated session.

Methods.Name: Bulk Delete Sessions
Methods.Description: Delete all the sessions for a user.

Methods.Name: Renew Current Session
Methods.Description: Renew the currently authenticated session.

Methods.Name: Delete Session
Methods.Description: Delete a specific session for a user.

Methods.Name: List Sessions
Methods.Description: Get a list of all the accounts sessions.

Methods.Name: Delete Sessions
Methods.Description: Delete the authenticated session.

Methods.Name: Show Session
Methods.Description: Show a specific session for a user.

Methods.Name: Create Ticket Field
Methods.Description: Create a Zendesk ticket field.

Methods.Name: Get Ticket Field
Methods.Description: Get a Ticket Field by ID.

Methods.Name: List Ticket Fields
Methods.Description: Get a List of All Ticket Fields.

Methods.Name: List Ticket Field Options
Methods.Description: Get Zendesk ticket field options.

Methods.Name: Create Ticket Field Options
Methods.Description: Create Zendesk ticket field options.

Methods.Name: Upload Files
Methods.Description: Uploads a file that can be attached to a ticket comment.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Get a List of All Users.

Methods.Name: Upsert User
Methods.Description: Create or Update a User.

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Get a User by ID.

Methods.Name: Delete Target And Trigger
Methods.Description: delete a target and trigger for webhooks.

Methods.Name: Ticket Updated
Methods.Description: Triggered when a ticket is updated.

Methods.Name: Ticket Created
Methods.Description: Triggered when a ticket is created.

Methods.Name: Ticket Closed or Solved
Methods.Description: Triggered when a ticket is closed or solved by a user.

Methods.Name: List Ticket Comments
Methods.Description: Get a List of Comments for the Specified Ticket.

MetaDescription: Integrate your Zendesk support system to all aspects of your business to provide more accurate, timely & effective support. Build your own automation workflows with Cyclr's builder.
